includeNodeModules.description: Include package.json files found within node_modules folders or bower_components.

pinVersions.description: Use version pinning (maintain a single version only and not semver ranges)

preserveSemverRanges.description: Preserve (but continue to upgrade) any existing semver ranges

pinAllExceptPeerDependencies.description: Pin dependency versions for all except peerDependencies

pinOnlyDevDependencies.description: Pin dependency versions for devDependencies and retain semver ranges for others

autodetectPinVersions.description: Autodetect whether to pin dependencies or maintain ranges

separateMajorReleases.description: Separate major versions of dependencies into individual branches/PRs

separatePatchReleases.description: Separate patch and minor releases of dependencies into separate PRs

combinePatchMinorReleases.description: Do not separate patch and minor upgrades into separate PRs for the same dependency

renovatePrefix.description: Use renovate/ as prefix for all branch names

semanticCommitType.description: Use {{arg0}} as semantic commit type for commit messages and PR titles

semanticPrefixChore.description: Use chore as semantic commit type for commit messages and PR titles

semanticPrefixFix.description: Use fix as semantic commit type for commit messages and PR titles

disableDigestUpdates.description: Disable digest and git hash updates

semanticPrefixFixDepsChoreOthers.description: If semantic commits detected, use semantic commit type fix for dependencies and chore for all others

semanticCommitTypeAll.description: If semantic commits detected, use semantic commit type {{arg0}} for all

rebaseStalePrs.description: Rebase existing PRs any time the base branch has been updated

unpublishSafe.description: Set a status check to warn when upgrades <  24 hours old might get unpublished

unpublishSafeDisabled.description: Create branches/PRs for dependency upgrades as soon as they're available

prImmediately.description: Raise PRs immediately (after branch is created)

prNotPending.description: Wait until branch tests have passed or failed before creating the PR

prHourlyLimitNone.description: Removes rate limit for PR creation per hour

prHourlyLimit1.description: Rate limit PR creation to a maximum of one per hour

prHourlyLimit2.description: Rate limit PR creation to a maximum of two per hour

prHourlyLimit4.description: Rate limit PR creation to a maximum of four per hour

prConcurrentLimitNone.description: Remove limit for concurrent Renovate PRs at any time

prConcurrentLimit10.description: Limit to maximum 10 concurrent Renovate PRs at any time

prConcurrentLimit20.description: Limit to maximum 20 concurrent Renovate PRs at any time

automergeDisabled.description: Disable automerging feature - wait for humans to merge all PRs

automergeDigest.description: Automerge digest upgrades if they pass tests

automergePatch.description: Automerge patch upgrades if they pass tests

automergeMinor.description: Automerge patch and minor upgrades if they pass tests

automergeMajor.description: Automerge all upgrades (inluding major) if they pass tests

automergeAll.description: Automerge all upgrades (inluding major) if they pass tests

automergeBranchMergeCommit.description: If automerging, perform a merge-commit on branch (no PR)

automergeBranchPush.description: If automerging, push the new commit directly to base branch (no PR)

automergePr.description: Raise a PR first before any automerging

automergeRequireAllStatusChecks.description: Require all status checks to pass before any automerging

skipStatusChecks.description: Skip status checks and automerge right away

maintainLockFilesDisabled.description: Update existing lock files only when package.json is modified

pinDigestsDisabled.description: Disable pinning of docker dependency digests

maintainLockFilesWeekly.description: Run lock file maintenance (updates) early Monday mornings

maintainLockFilesMonthly.description: Run lock file maintenance (updates) on the first day of each month

ignoreUnstable.description: Upgrade to unstable versions only if the existing version is unstable

respectLatest.description: Upgrade versions up to the "latest" tag in npm registry

updateNotScheduled.description: Keep existing branches updated even when not scheduled

noUnscheduledUpdates.description: Make no updates to branches when not scheduled

automergeLinters.description: Update lint packages automatically if tests pass

pinSkipCi.description: Add [skip ci] to commit message body whenever pinning

gitSignOff.description: Append git Signed-off-by signature to git commits.

assignAndReview.description: Set {{arg0}} as assignee and reviewer of PRs

semanticCommits.description: Use semantic prefixes for commit messages and PR titles

semanticCommitsDisabled.description: Disable semantic prefixes for commit messages and PR titles

semanticCommitScope.description: Use semantic commit scope {{arg0}} for all commits and PR titles

semanticCommitScopeDisabled.description: Disable semantic commit scope for all commits and PR titles

widenPeerDependencies.description: Always widen peerDependencies semver ranges when updating, instead of replacing

pathSemanticCommitType.description: Use semanticCommitType {{arg0}} for all package files matching path {{arg1}}

followTag.description: For package {{arg0}}, strictly follow release tag {{arg1}}
